statements: SELECT * FROM customer_issues WHERE status = 'resolved';
SELECT id, issue_description FROM customer_issues WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT resolution, status FROM customer_issues WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_issues ORDER BY issue_description DESC;
SELECT id, issue_description, resolution FROM customer_issues WHERE status <> 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM customer_issues WHERE status='open';
SELECT customer_id,issue_description FROM customer_issues WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_issues WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT id,issue_description FROM customer_issues WHERE customer_id IN (1,2,3) AND status='pending' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT customer_id,resolution,issue_description,status FROM customer_issues WHERE status!='resolved' ORDER BY resolution DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM issues;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM issues WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, resolution FROM issues ORDER BY issue_id ASC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, resolution FROM issues WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resolution_id, issue_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM issues WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT issue_description, resolution FROM issues WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, resolution FROM issues JOIN resolutions ON issues.issue_id = resolutions.issue_id
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM issues
SELECT * FROM CustomerIssues;
SELECT issue_description, issue_status FROM CustomerIssues WHERE issue_status='Open';
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, resolution FROM CustomerIssues ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerHistory WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM IssueCategories WHERE category_name='Technical';
SELECT * FROM CustomerIssues WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, resolution FROM CustomerIssues WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT issue_id, customer_id, issue_description FROM CustomerIssues WHERE issue_status = 'Closed' AND resolution IS NULL;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM IssueCategories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM CustomerIssues GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_issues > 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Issue ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT issue_description, issue_status FROM Issue WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT resolution_description, resolution_date FROM Resolution WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone FROM Customer;
SELECT issue_id, customer_id, issue_description, issue_status, date_reported FROM Issue WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT resolution_id, issue_id, resolution_description, resolved_by, resolution_date FROM Resolution ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone FROM Customer WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT insights_id, issue_id, resolution_id, analysis_results FROM Insights WHERE analysis_results LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, address, date_created FROM customers WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM issues WHERE resolved = false ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, i.issue_description, r.resolution_description FROM customers c JOIN issues i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN resolutions r ON i.issue_id = r.issue_id;
SELECT t.technician_name, t.expertise_area, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM technicians t JOIN resolutions r ON t.technician_id = r.technician_id GROUP BY t.technician_name;
SELECT i.metric, AVG(i.value) AS avg_value FROM insights i WHERE issue_id IN (SELECT issue_id FROM issues WHERE resolved = true) GROUP BY i.metric ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
